item.title: 洞察：中国放松毛泽东时代居住规定的努力遇到障碍
item.description:
Yang Guang's rise from a village farmer to an Audi-driving businessman with two properties hinged largely on one of the most coveted documents in China: an urban hukou, or residency permit.翻译:杨光从一名乡村农民成长为一名拥有两处房产、开奥迪的商人，很大程度上取决于中国最令人垂涎​​的证件之一：城市户口或居住证。

The 45-year-old who lives in the central city of Zhengzhou likens the permit - which typically ties a person's access to health, education, loans and other services to their birthplace - to a "cattle ear-tag the state clipped us with".翻译:这位住在市中心郑州的 45 岁男子将许可证比作“国家给我们剪的牛耳标”——它通常将一个人获得医疗、教育、贷款和其他服务的机会与其出生地联系起来。 。

"It uses this tag to sort us into different categories of people entitled to different sets of privileges and subjected to different obligations," he said.翻译:“它使用这个标签将我们分为不同类别的人，这些人有权享有不同的特权并承担不同的义务，”他说。

When Zhengzhou in the early 2000s temporarily allowed those who bought an apartment to also qualify for a city hukou, Yang seized the opportunity, allowing him to register a business and open stores across Henan province's capital, transforming his fortunes.翻译:2000年代初，郑州暂时允许购房者获得城市户口，杨抓住了这个机会，允许他在河南省会城市注册企业并开设商店，改变了他的命运。

In recent months, Chinese authorities have fanned hopes among some economists that the internal passport system that has largely tethered people's destinies to their place of origin since the 1950s may be in its dying days. A distressed property market and sluggish consumption have injected new urgency into a drive to loosen restrictions and grant more people the opportunities that urban registration affords.翻译:近几个月来，中国当局在一些经济学家中激起了希望，即自 20 世纪 50 年代以来在很大程度上将人们的命运与原籍地联系在一起的内部护照制度可能已到了消亡的时候。 低迷的房地产市场和低迷的消费为放松限制、为更多人提供落户机会注入了新的紧迫性。

The Ministry of Public Security in August called on cities with up to 3 million people to abolish hukou, and those with 3-5 million to significantly relax issuance. Zhejiang and Jiangsu provinces have announced plans for an almost complete opening to new residents.翻译:公安部8月呼吁人口300万以下的城市取消户口，人口3-500万的城市大幅放宽户口发放。浙江和江苏省已宣布计划几乎全面向新居民开放。

But two people involved in hukou policy discussions within the central government told Reuters that progress is stalling, making further significant breakthroughs unlikely, especially in China's larger cities.翻译:但两名参与中央政府内部户口政策讨论的人士告诉路透社，进展正在停滞，不可能取得进一步的重大突破，尤其是在中国的大城市。

The accounts described previously unreported tensions over hukou reform, with Chinese officials acknowledging a strong economic rationale for change but hesitant to take decisive moves that might disrupt social stability and burden indebted cities with added costs.翻译:这些报道描述了此前未报道过的户口改革紧张局势，中国官员承认改革有强有力的经济理由，但不愿采取果断行动，因为这可能会破坏社会稳定并给负债城市带来额外成本。

"Hukou reform is a hard bone to chew," said Jia Kang, founding president of the China Academy of New Supply-Side Economics, who advises the government on policies including hukou. "It should be a natural process, it's not something you can do simply because you want to."翻译:“户口改革是一块难啃的骨头，”中国新供给侧经济研究院创始院长贾康说，他为政府提供包括户口在内的政策建议。 “这应该是一个自然的过程，不是你想做就能做的事情。”

"Currently, all reforms are difficult."翻译:“目前，一切改革都困难重重。”

Jia said that while neither the central government nor local governments oppose further hukou easing, implementation depends on cities having the funds and public service capacity.翻译:贾庆林表示，虽然中央政府和地方政府都不反对进一步放宽户口，但具体实施取决于城市有资金和公共服务能力。

China's Ministry of Public Security and the National Development and Reform Commission, the top planning agency, did not respond to requests for comment.翻译:中国公安部和最高规划机构国家发展和改革委员会没有回应置评请求。

The advisers said China's largest cities have limited residential supply and face pollution and congestion, affecting their ability to absorb more people. Medium-sized and smaller cities have excess housing stock they would gladly offer to new residents, but due to surging debt they lack the funds to expand access to health facilities, elderly care and education.翻译:顾问们表示，中国最大的城市住宅供应有限，并面临污染和拥堵，影响了它们吸纳更多人口的能力。中小城市拥有过剩的住房存量，他们很乐意向新居民提供，但由于债务激增，他们缺乏资金来扩大医疗设施、养老和教育的覆盖范围。

"The quality of our urbanisation is poor," said the second government adviser, who spoke on the condition of anonymity due to the topic's sensitivity.翻译:“我们的城市化质量很差，”第二位政府顾问说，由于该话题的敏感性，他要求匿名。

Most Chinese cities grew dramatically over the past four decades as the country opened up to entrepreneurship and invested in transport infrastructure and residential projects. But the world's second-largest economy still lags the 80-90% urbanisation rate in the developed world.翻译:随着国家开放创业精神并投资交通基础设施和住宅项目，大多数中国城市在过去四十年中急剧发展。但世界第二大经济体的城市化率仍落后于发达国家80%至90%的水平。

About 65% of China's 1.4 billion people live in urban areas, compared with 55% in 2013. But only 48% of the population have a city hukou, official data show. That gap has remained steady throughout the period.翻译:中国14亿人口中约有65%居住在城市地区，而2013年这一比例为55%。但官方数据显示，只有48%的人口拥有城市户口。这一差距在此期间一直保持稳定。

While Beijing is working to address strains in local finances, another set of reforms to encourage more people to settle in cities is not in the pipeline, the advisers said.翻译:顾问们表示，虽然北京正在努力解决地方财政紧张的问题，但另一套鼓励更多人在城市定居的改革尚未酝酿之中。

In China, rural hukou come with land rights - and, implicitly, the insurance policy of living off the farm if city jobs are unavailable - making many migrant workers from the countryside reluctant to apply for urban permits, especially in a slowing economy.翻译:在中国，农村户口伴随着土地权——而且隐含着如果无法获得城市工作就以务农为生的保险政策——使得许多来自农村的农民工不愿申请城市许可证，尤其是在经济放缓的情况下。

Local governments can lease land for farming, as well as residential, commercial and industrial development, but there is no private land ownership in China and land rights cannot be traded freely.翻译:地方政府可以租赁土地用于农业以及住宅、商业和工业开发，但中国不存在土地私有制，土地权不能自由交易。

"We must push forward land system reform. We have plenty of land, which has been wasted," the second adviser said, adding however that China's leaders are unwilling to go down that path.翻译:“我们必须推进土地制度改革。我们有大量土地，但都被浪费了，”第二位顾问说，但他补充说，中国领导人不愿意走这条路。

Shao Xiaogai, a 39-year-old store manager in Zhengzhou, prefers to stay registered in her village in the central Henan province. She had tried to get an urban hukou to make it easier to enrol her son in a public school, but a spot opened up for him eventually anyway.翻译:39 岁的郑州商店经理邵小改更愿意留在河南省中部的村庄。她曾试图获得城市户口，以便更容易让儿子进入公立学校就读，但最终还是为他腾出了一个名额。

"I tell my son to study hard because we are outsiders in this city," said Shao. "If he doesn't do well here, his dad and I will become his burden if we stay in the city. In the village, we can grow whatever food we need."翻译:“我告诉儿子要努力学习，因为我们是这个城市的外人，”邵说。 “如果他在这里过得不好，我和他爸爸留在城里就会成为他的负担。在村里，我们可以种植任何我们需要的食物。”

Jia said these hurdles mean further hukou liberalisation will be on a city-by-city basis. The second adviser said the pace of urbanisation will slow in coming years, making rural revitalisation more of a priority for China's leaders.

CONSUMING LESS

Hukou date back to the famines of last century, when Mao Zedong tied food rations to people's birthplaces to prevent starving peasants from flocking to better-fed cities.翻译:户口可以追溯到上个世纪的饥荒，当时毛泽东将粮食配给与人们的出生地挂钩，以防止饥饿的农民涌入食物更好的城市。

In their modern iteration, hukou limit access to public services for many of the almost 300 million rural migrants who leave their families behind to assemble the smartphones, raise the skyscrapers, lay the roads and clean the malls in Chinese cities.翻译:在现代版本中，户口限制了近3亿农民工获得公共服务的机会，他们离开家人在中国城市组装智能手机、建造摩天大楼、铺设道路和打扫商场。

Migrants get smaller reimbursements for medical expenses than those with urban registration and cannot take their employer's contributions to retirement savings - two-thirds of the pot - with them when they return home.翻译:与城市户口的农民工相比，农民工获得的医疗费用报销要少，而且回国时也不能带走雇主缴纳的退休储蓄（三分之二）。

As a result, they save more of their income, keeping household consumption - which China wants to make a more prominent driver of economic growth - subdued.翻译:结果，他们将更多收入储蓄起来，从而抑制了家庭消费——中国希望家庭消费成为经济增长的更重要推动力。

Cai Fang, a central bank adviser, estimates migrant workers typically spend 23% less than those with urban hukou, potentially depriving the economy of more than 2 trillion yuan ($281 billion) - or 1.7% of last year's GDP - in domestic consumption annually.翻译:央行顾问蔡昉估计，农民工的支出通常比城市户口的农民工少 23%，这可能会导致经济每年损失超过 2 万亿元人民币（2810 亿美元）的国内消费，即去年 GDP 的 1.7%。

There's also the imperative of boosting demand for apartments, of which China has too many. The property market, which accounts for roughly a quarter of the economy, has been rattled by private developer defaults.翻译:提高公寓需求也势在必行，而中国的公寓数量太多了。约占经济四分之一的房地产市场因私人开发商违约而陷入困境。

The market would "substantially improve if migrants could be treated more equally" through improved access to better jobs and benefits and enabling them to buy apartments, said Martin Whyte, professor emeritus of international studies and sociology at Harvard University.

'LOW-END POPULATION'

An uncontrolled influx of migrants into the cities, however, may present risks for China's leaders.翻译:然而，不受控制的农民工涌入城市可能会给中国领导人带来风险。

In 2017, after a fire broke out in migrant workers' living quarters, Beijing authorities launched a campaign to expel people without capital-city hukou, sparking a rare open backlash against the government.翻译:2017年，农民工宿舍发生火灾后，北京当局发起了驱逐无京城户口人员的运动，引发了罕见的公开反对政府的反弹。

Mega-cities such as Beijing, Shanghai, Shenzhen and Guangzhou have "no chance" of opening up in coming years due to "considerations of social stability and harmony", said Jia.翻译:贾表示，出于“社会稳定和谐的考虑”，北京、上海、深圳和广州等大城市“没有机会”在未来几年开放。

"Beijing tried to drive out 'low-end population' at one point, which created chaos," he said, referencing the term that officials in the capital used at the time.翻译:“北京曾一度试图驱逐‘低端人口’，结果造成了混乱，”他说，他指的是当时首都官员使用的这个词。

In Zhengzhou, Yang, the businessman, recalled how life was different before he obtained a city hukou.翻译:在郑州，商人杨回忆起他获得城市户口之前的生活是如何不同的。

He made a living operating an unlicensed mini-mart in a district of rural migrants, often sleeping on a straw mat in a park as he played hide-and-seek with the police.翻译:他在一个农民工聚集区经营一家无牌小超市谋生，经常睡在公园的草席上，与警察玩捉迷藏。

"They would organise big teams of volunteers and officers to knock on doors at night to flush out people without hukou," Yang said.翻译:杨说：“他们会组织志愿者和官员组成的大队，在夜间敲门，驱逐没有户口的人。”

Zhengzhou's government did not respond to Reuters queries.翻译:郑州市政府没有回应路透社的询问。

Once he had the permit, Yang's prospects soared.翻译:获得许可后，杨的前途一片光明。

In addition to expanding his business, he bought a second home - something only hukou holders could have - and his first car, a locally made Changan 50 minivan. He enjoyed a more active social life.翻译:除了扩大业务之外，他还购买了第二套住房（只有户口持有人才能拥有）和他的第一辆车，一辆本地制造的长安 50 小型货车。他享受着更加活跃的社交生活。

"Not many people could afford private vehicles at the time. Pretty girls would ask me to drive them around for some fun," Yang said. "And I did!"翻译:“当时买得起私家车的人不多，漂亮女孩都会叫我开着它们出去玩。”杨说。 “我做到了！”

($1 = 7.1233 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.1233 人民币）

item.title: 中国电子商务平台Temu吸引美元商店的购物者-数据
item.description:
Temu, the fast-growing Chinese e-commerce platform selling $4 home decor and $10 shirts, is successfully taking on U.S. dollar stores including industry leader Dollar General (DG.N), according to the latest market share data.翻译:根据最新的市场份额数据，快速发展的中国电子商务平台 Temu 正在成功与包括行业领导者 Dollar General (DG.N)在内的美元商店展开竞争，销售 4 美元的家居装饰品和 10 美元的衬衫。

As of last month, Temu accounted for nearly 17% of market share in the United States within the discount stores categories, according to data analytics firm Earnest Analytics. That compares to 8% for the dollar chain Five Below (FIVE.O), 43% for Dollar General (DG.N) and 28% for Dollar Tree.翻译:根据数据分析公司 Earnest Analytics 的数据，截至上个月，Temu 占据了美国折扣店类别近 17% 的市场份额。相比之下，美元链五以下(FIVE.O)为 8%，Dollar General (DG.N)为 43%，Dollar Tree 为 28%。

Temu launched in the United States in September 2022 and quickly became popular through its use of social-media influencers to tout its merchandise as better and more affordable than traditional stores.翻译:Temu 于 2022 年 9 月在美国推出，并通过利用社交媒体影响力宣传其商品比传统商店更好、更实惠而迅速走红。

"Its (Temu) low prices on household goods and consumer staples makes it more of a threat to brick-and-mortar discounters like the dollar stores than other online marketplaces," said Michael Maloof, head of marketing at Earnest Analytics.翻译:Earnest Analytics 营销主管迈克尔·马卢夫 (Michael Maloof) 表示：“Temu 的家居用品和消费品价格低廉，这使得它对一元店等实体折扣店的威胁比其他在线市场更大。”

Temu sells apparel including $12 dresses and $20 sneakers, while also offering similar holiday decor, storage containers and toys as dollar stores. Analysts expect it to generate more than $16 billion in revenue this year as it expands internationally.翻译:Temu 销售的服装包括 12 美元的连衣裙和 20 美元的运动鞋，同时还提供与一元店类似的节日装饰、储物容器和玩具。分析师预计，随着其国际扩张，该公司今年的收入将超过 160 亿美元。

"Temu has the advantage of novelty and excitement that is hard to re-create for staid low-end discount retail brands," said Michael Ashley Schulman, chief investment officer at Running Point Capital Advisors.翻译:Running Point Capital Advisors 首席投资官迈克尔·阿什利·舒尔曼 (Michael Ashley Schulman) 表示：“Temu 的优势在于新颖、令人兴奋，而这种优势是古板的低端折扣零售品牌难以复制的。”

Temu, Dollar General, Dollar Tree and Five Below did not respond to requests for comments on the research. The U.S. dollar stores have said previously they do not see an effect from Temu on their sales because of relatively smaller online presences and differing customers.翻译:Temu、Dollar General、Dollar Tree 和 Five Below 没有回应对该研究发表评论的请求。美元商店此前曾表示，由于在线业务规模相对较小且客户不同，他们认为 Temu 不会对其销售产生影响。

While dollar stores have maintained strength among customers buying necessities like food, beverages and items like detergent, they are dealing with a shift in consumer demand and also struggling with operational missteps.翻译:虽然一元店在购买食品、饮料和洗涤剂等必需品的消费者中保持着强劲势头，但它们正在应对消费者需求的转变，并在运营失误中苦苦挣扎。

Dollar General has cut its annual profit forecast three times this year as budget-conscious shoppers have cut spending on higher-margin discretionary goods and shifted to buying more lower-margin consumable goods.翻译:由于精打细算的购物者削减了利润率较高的非必需品支出，转而购买更多利润率较低的消费品，Dollar General 今年已三度下调年度利润预期。

Margins have also fallen at dollar stores because they are marking down merchandise to clear excess inventory and like many retailers are also being hurt by retail theft.翻译:一元店的利润率也下降了，因为它们对商品进行降价以清理多余的库存，而且像许多零售商一样，它们也受到零售盗窃的损害。

Tennessee-based Dollar General has seen the steepest decline in market share compared to competitors, according to Earnest Analytics. It held a 43% market share in November, down from about 57% in January. Dollar Tree's share slid nearly four percentage points from 32% in January to 28% in November.翻译:根据 Earnest Analytics 的数据，与竞争对手相比，田纳西州的 Dollar General 的市场份额下降幅度最大。 11 月份该公司的市场份额为 43%，低于 1 月份的 57% 左右。 Dollar Tree的份额从1月份的32%下降到11月份的28%，下降了近四个百分点。

Temu is benefiting from shopper fatigue with high prices and inflation, said Peter Earle, an economist at the American Institute for Economic Research, a libertarian, free-market think tank. Temu's parent company PDD Group (PDD.O) said revenue rose by 94% to 68.84 billion yuan ($9.62 billion) in the quarter ended Sept. 30 from a year ago.翻译:美国经济研究所（一家自由主义、自由市场智库）的经济学家彼得·厄尔（Peter Earle）表示，特姆正受益于高物价和通货膨胀带来的购物疲劳。 Temu 的母公司 PDD Group (PDD.O)表示，截至 9 月 30 日的季度收入较上年同期增长94%，达到 688.4 亿元人民币（合 96.2 亿美元）。

Temu uses a network of China-based manufacturers of cheap personal electronics, clothes and home goods. Factories and merchants on Temu send merchandise directly to Temu shoppers, using a trade exemption that allows shipments under $800 to enter the U.S. duty-free.翻译:Temu 利用中国廉价个人电子产品、服装和家居用品制造商的网络。 Temu 上的工厂和商家使用贸易豁免政策，将商品直接发送给 Temu 购物者，该贸易豁免允许 800 美元以下的货物免税进入美国。

"Temu with their 'shop like a billionaire' slogan has mastered gamification and rewards to make online shopping fun, easy, and cheaper than the dollar stores," Running Point's Schulman said.翻译:Running Point 的舒尔曼表示：“Temu 的口号是‘像亿万富翁一样购物’，他们已经掌握了游戏化和奖励机制，使在线购物变得有趣、轻松，而且比一元店更便宜。”

item.title: 美国监测中国军舰在柬埔寨基地的报告
item.description:
The United States is monitoring reports of Chinese warships docking in Cambodia and has serious concerns about Beijing's plans to have exclusive control over parts of the main naval base there, a State Department spokesperson said on Wednesday.翻译:美国国务院发言人周三表示，美国正在监视有关中国军舰停靠柬埔寨的报道，并对北京计划独家控制柬埔寨主要海军基地部分地区的计划表示严重关切。

Radio Free Asia reported on Tuesday that Chinese warships had arrived at Cambodia's Ream Naval Base and cited Cambodian Defense Minister Tea Seiha as saying in a Facebook post on Sunday that this was "in preparation for training" of the Cambodian Navy.翻译:自由亚洲电台周二报道称，中国军舰已抵达柬埔寨云朗海军基地，并援引柬埔寨国防部长蒂西哈周日在脸书上发帖称，这是“为训练柬埔寨海军做准备”。

RFA said the warship visit coincided with meetings in Phnom Penh on Monday between Cambodia's leaders and He Weidong, vice chairman of China's Central Military Commission, Beijing's top military command body.翻译:自由亚洲电台称，此次军舰访问恰逢柬埔寨领导人周一与中国最高军事指挥机构中国中央军事委员会副主席何卫东在金边举行会晤。

A U.S. State Department spokesperson said Washington was monitoring the reports and added, referring to the People's Republic of China: "While we have no comment on this specific development, we have serious concerns about the PRC's plans for exclusive control over portions of Ream Naval Base."翻译:美国国务院发言人表示，华盛顿正在关注这些报道，并在提到中华人民共和国时补充道：“虽然我们对这一具体事态发展不予置评，但我们对中华人民共和国对云朗海军基地部分地区进行独家控制的计划表示严重关切”。

The U.S. was urging Cambodia to ensure China would not be allowed "presence or sensitive technology" at Ream that would "undermine Cambodia's sovereignty, contravene its constitution, and affect regional stability," the official said. In military jargon "presence or sensitive technology" generally refers to radar or other surveillance capabilities.翻译:这位官员表示，美国敦促柬埔寨确保不允许中国在云朗“存在或使用敏感技术”，因为这将“损害柬埔寨主权、违反其宪法并影响地区稳定”。在军事术语中，“存在或敏感技术”通常指雷达或其他监视能力。

RFA said it was unclear how many Chinese warships docked at Ream, but that images on Tea Seiha's Facebook page appeared to show at least two. It said satellite images from Dec. 3 also showed two vessels, likely corvettes or frigates, at a new pier there.翻译:RFA 表示，目前尚不清楚有多少艘中国军舰停靠在云朗，但 Tea Seiha 的 Facebook 页面上的图片似乎显示至少有两艘。据称，12 月 3 日的卫星图像还显示，那里的一个新码头上有两艘船只，可能是护卫舰或护卫舰。

China's Washington embassy did not immediately respond to a request for comment.翻译:中国驻华盛顿大使馆没有立即回应置评请求。

Cambodia's decision to allow China to develop Ream has upset Washington and neighbors worried it will give Beijing a new outpost near the contested South China Sea.翻译:柬埔寨允许中国开发云壤的决定令华盛顿和邻国感到不安，担心这将给北京在有争议的南中国海附近提供一个新的前哨基地。

The Pentagon believes the base expansion plans include exclusive use of its northern portion for China's military and says neither country has shared full details about the extent of the plans. Washington says this shows a lack of transparency.翻译:五角大楼认为，基地扩建计划包括将其北部地区专门供中国军队使用，并表示两国都没有透露有关计划范围的完整细节。华盛顿表示，这表明缺乏透明度。

South China Sea expert Gregory Poling at Washington's Center for Strategic and International Studies said the main concern for the U.S. and its partners would be any radar equipment China might install at Ream.翻译:华盛顿战略与国际研究中心的南海专家格雷戈里·波林表示，美国及其合作伙伴主要担心的是中国可能在云朗安装的雷达设备。

"The naval aspects of the base aren't particularly worrying for the U.S. - they don't get Chinese ships any closer to the Strait of Malacca, for instance, than China's bases in the Spratlys already do," he said.翻译:他说：“该基地的海军方面并不是特别让美国担心——例如，他们没有让中国船只比中国在南沙群岛的基地更接近马六甲海峡。”

"They should concern Thailand and Vietnam a bit, but the real question will be what capabilities get built on the northern half of the base that is set aside for China's exclusive use. Sensing capabilities there, for instance, would considerably extend China's ability to surveil the Gulf of Thailand and eastern Indian Ocean."翻译:“他们应该担心泰国和越南，但真正的问题是在专门为中国使用的基地北半部建立什么能力。例如，那里的传感能力将大大扩展中国的监视能力泰国湾和东印度洋。”

Cambodia has dismissed fears that it would allow a Chinese military base on its soil, saying any country could use the Ream facilities, while it was open to accepting military assistance from anyone.翻译:柬埔寨否认了有关该国将允许中国在其领土上建立军事基地的担忧，称任何国家都可以使用云壤设施，同时它对接受任何国家的军事援助持开放态度。

In 2020, Cambodia said it had razed a U.S.-funded facility at Ream to allow expansion there.翻译:2020年，柬埔寨表示已拆除了位于云朗的一处由美国资助的设施，以允许在那里扩张。

Reporting by David Brunnstrom; Editing by Sandra Maler翻译:大卫·布伦斯特罗姆报道；桑德拉·马勒编辑

item.title: 美国希望对外国航空维修站进行药物测试
item.description:
The U.S. Federal Aviation Administration said on Wednesday it wants to require aviation-repair stations in foreign countries to conduct drug and alcohol testing for employees performing safety-sensitive maintenance functions for U.S. airlines.翻译:美国联邦航空管理局周三表示，希望要求外国航空维修站对为美国航空公司执行安全敏感维修职能的员工进行药物和酒精测试。

The FAA said few countries require testing of aviation or maintenance personnel.翻译:美国联邦航空局表示，很少有国家要求对航空或维修人员进行测试。

The proposed rule would impact approximately 977 repair stations in 65 countries and ensure that "employees are held to the same high level of safety standards regardless of where they are physically located."翻译:拟议的规则将影响 65 个国家的约 977 个维修站，并确保“员工无论身在何处，都遵守相同的高水平安全标准。”

The FAA has been considering the issue for decades and Congress previously directed the agency to set the requirements.翻译:美国联邦航空局几十年来一直在考虑这个问题，国会此前曾指示该机构制定要求。

Aviation unions for years have called for testing for maintenance functions that are outsourced to repair stations outside the United States.翻译:多年来，航空工会一直呼吁对外包给美国境外维修站的维护功能进行测试。

Transport Workers Union President John Samuelsen翻译:运输工人工会主席约翰·萨缪尔森

said the proposal will close a "big safety gap ... Airline mechanics in China and other lower-wage, lower-standard countries who work on U.S. commercial aircraft will have to undergo drug and alcohol testing - just like mechanics here."翻译:表示该提案将弥补“巨大的安全差距……在中国和其他工资较低、标准较低的国家，在美国商用飞机上工作的航空公司机械师将必须接受药物和酒精测试——就像这里的机械师一样。”

The group said that since 2017, the U.S. airline industry has eliminated more than 5,000 U.S. mechanic jobs, while creating 35,000 mechanic jobs in foreign countries.翻译:该组织表示，自2017年以来，美国航空业已经裁掉了5000多个美国机械师岗位，同时在国外创造了35000个机械师岗位。

The FAA said some argue U.S.-based maintenance facilities "are operating at an economic disadvantage as maintenance facilities abroad are not required to subject employees to drug and alcohol testing and, therefore, are essentially circumventing the associated costs to maintain a testing program."翻译:美国联邦航空局表示，一些人认为美国的维修设施“在经济上处于不利地位，因为国外的维修设施不需要对员工进行药物和酒精测试，因此基本上规避了维持测试计划的相关成本。”

Airlines for America, which represents the largest U.S. airlines, declined immediate comment.翻译:代表美国最大航空公司的美国航空公司拒绝立即发表评论。

Airlines have said previously that privacy and employment laws in foreign countries could conflict with U.S. drug and alcohol testing requirements. The FAA said airlines could seek a waiver of the requirements for specific foreign repair stations if they cannot comply for domestic reasons.翻译:航空公司此前曾表示，外国的隐私和就业法可能与美国的药物和酒精测试要求相冲突。美国联邦航空局表示，如果航空公司因国内原因无法遵守规定，则可以寻求豁免特定外国维修站的要求。

The FAA said the rule would boost safety by deterring substance abuse by safety-sensitive aviation employees and is estimated to cost carriers $102.3 million over five years.翻译:美国联邦航空局表示，该规定将通过阻止对安全敏感的航空员工滥用药物来提高安全性，预计五年内将导致航空公司损失 1.023 亿美元。

It will be open for public comment until early February.翻译:它将在二月初之前公开征求公众意见。

Reporting by David Shepardson in Washington Editing by Chizu Nomiyama, Bernadette Baum and Matthew Lewis翻译:大卫·谢泼德森 (David Shepardson) 驻华盛顿报道 野山智津 (Chizu Nomiyama)、伯纳黛特·鲍姆 (Bernadette Baum) 和马修·刘易斯 (Matthew Lewis) 编辑

item.title: 中国表示“坚决反对”英国对其企业实施制裁
item.description:
China's embassy in the United Kingdom said on Wednesday it is firmly opposed to Britain's sanctions on Chinese companies that London said were involved in Russia's military supply chains.翻译:中国驻英国大使馆周三表示，坚决反对英国对伦敦称参与俄罗斯军事供应链的中国企业实施制裁。

China opposes the UK's violation of international law, the abuse of unilateral sanctions and damage to the legitimate rights and interests of Chinese companies, and has lodged solemn representations with the UK, the embassy said in a statement.翻译:中方反对英方违反国际法、滥用单边制裁、损害中国企业合法权益，已向英方提出严正交涉。

"China has always adhered to an objective and just position on the Ukrainian issue, and has been actively committed to promoting peace talks and a political settlement," it said.翻译:中方在乌克兰问题上始终坚持客观公正立场，积极致力于劝和促谈、政治解决。

"We urge the British government to immediately correct its mistake and lift the sanctions against Chinese companies," the embassy said, warning that any action that harms China's interests will be met with a firm response.翻译:中国驻英国使馆表示，我们敦促英国政府立即纠正错误，取消对中国企业的制裁，任何损害中国利益的行为都将遭到坚决回应。

Reporting by Twinnie Siu in Hong Kong and Ethan Wang in Beijing; Editing by Louise Heavens翻译:Twinnie Siu 在香港和 Ethan Wang 在北京的报道；路易丝·天堂编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 王毅：中方希望缅甸早日实现民族和解
item.description:
China hopes Myanmar achieves national reconciliation quickly and continues its political transformation, top Chinese diplomat Wang Yi said on Wednesday.翻译:中国高级外交官王毅周三表示，中国希望缅甸尽快实现民族和解并继续政治转型。

Wang, who met Myanmar's Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister Than Swe in Beijing, said both countries should strengthen law enforcement cooperation to eradicate telecom fraud, China's foreign ministry said in a statement.翻译:中国外交部在一份声明中表示，王毅在北京会见了缅甸副总理兼外交部长丹瑞，并表示两国应加强执法合作，消除电信欺诈。

Myanmar's military has been locked in a surge of fighting with three ethnic rebel groups in the biggest challenge to its grip on the Southeast Asian nation since seizing power from an elected government in a 2021 coup.翻译:缅甸军方与三个民族叛乱组织陷入激烈交战，这是自 2021 年政变中从民选政府手中夺取政权以来，缅甸军方对这个东南亚国家的控制力面临的最大挑战。

Meanwhile, China has been cracking down on telecom fraud syndicates in Myanmar that it says have swindled Chinese nationals of large sums of money.翻译:与此同时，中国一直在打击缅甸的电信诈骗集团，称这些集团诈骗了中国公民大笔资金。

"China hopes that Myanmar will achieve national reconciliation and continue its political transformation process under the constitutional framework as soon as possible," Wang said in the meeting.翻译:王毅在会上表示，中方希望缅甸尽快实现民族和解，在宪法框架下继续推进政治转型进程。

He acknowledged that recent cooperation between the two countries in cracking down telecom fraud and rescuing those trapped in northern Myanmar had yielded results.翻译:他承认，近期两国在打击电信诈骗、营救缅北被困人员等方面的合作取得了成效。

"Both sides should strengthen law enforcement and security cooperation and completely eradicate the cancer of online gambling and telecom fraud," he said.翻译:双方应加强执法安全合作，彻底铲除网络赌博、电信诈骗毒瘤。

Beijing said last month that Myanmar authorities have handed over 31,000 telecom fraud suspects to China. Chinese state media reported that over 100,000 people engage in telecom fraud each day in at least 1,000 scam centres in Myanmar.翻译:北京上个月表示，缅甸当局已将31,000名电信诈骗嫌疑人移交给中国。中国官方媒体报道称，缅甸至少有 1000 个诈骗中心，每天有超过 10 万人从事电信诈骗。

Reporting by Ethan Wang in Beijing, Twinnie Siu in Hong Kong; Editing by Christina Fincher翻译:Ethan Wang 北京报道，Twinnie Siu 香港报道；克里斯蒂娜·芬奇编辑

item.title: 一带一路：意大利与中国有何协议？
item.description:
Italy has told China that it is quitting the Belt and Road Initiative (BRI), two government sources told Reuters on Wednesday, ending months of doubt over Rome's future in Beijing's ambitious infrastructure project.翻译:两名政府消息人士周三告诉路透社，意大利已告诉中国，它将退出“一带一路”倡议，结束了数月来对罗马在北京雄心勃勃的基础设施项目中的未来的怀疑。

Italy signed a preliminary accord with China in March 2019 that made it the only Group of Seven (G7) country to join the BRI project, which was launched by Chinese President Xi Jinping in 2013.翻译:意大利于 2019 年 3 月与中国签署了初步协议，成为唯一加入中国国家主席习近平于 2013 年发起的“一带一路”项目的七国集团 (G7) 国家。

The then Italian prime minister, Giuseppe Conte, hoped the deal would boost Italy's underperforming economy, but over the past four years it has produced little benefit.翻译:时任意大利总理朱塞佩·孔特希望这项协议能够提振意大利表现不佳的经济，但在过去四年里，它几乎没有产生什么好处。

Critics had voiced concern it would enable China to gain control of sensitive technologies and infrastructure and Italy has since taken a number of steps to veto takeovers or limit the sway of Chinese companies over their Italian counterparts.

INITIAL PREMISE

The two countries noted that they shared a common history, with Italy serving as the traditional landing place for the maritime section of the ancient Silk Route trading route linking Asia and western Europe.

PRINCIPAL OBJECTIVES

China and Italy committed to working together on strengthening their political relations and commercial ties, and promoting regional peace.

PLANNED AREAS OF COOPERATION

- Transport, logistics and infrastructure: Italy and China said they would work on projects such as roads, railways, bridges, civil aviation, ports, energy and telecommunications.翻译:- 交通、物流和基础设施：意大利和中国表示将在公路、铁路、桥梁、民航、港口、能源和电信等项目上开展合作。

- In the energy sector, State Grid Corporation of China has since 2014 owned a 35% stake in CDP Reti, a holding company that owns roughly a third of Italian power and gas grid operators Terna (TRN.MI) and Snam (SRG.MI).翻译:- 在能源领域，中国国家电网公司自2014年起持有CDP Reti 35%的股份，该控股公司拥有意大利电力和天然气电网运营商Terna (TRN.MI)和Snam (SRG.MI)约三分之一的股份） 。

- Removing obstacles to commerce and investment, promoting a partnership between their respective financial institutions.翻译:- 消除商业和投资障碍，促进各自金融机构之间的伙伴关系。

- Connectivity between people, developing a twinning network between cities and encouraging cultural, science, tourism and education exchanges.翻译:——民心相通，发展友好城市网络，鼓励文化、科技、旅游、教育交流。

- Environmental cooperation, pursuing sustainable and ecological development.翻译:——环境合作，追求可持续、生态发展。

($1 = 0.9284 euros)翻译:（1 美元 = 0.9284 欧元）

Writing by Keith Weir; Editing by Crispian Balmer and Toby Chopra翻译:基思·威尔撰写；克里斯皮安·巴尔默和托比·乔普拉编辑

item.title: 意大利告诉中国将退出“一带一路”倡议
item.description:
Summary:
  • Italy signed pact in 2019 expecting big boost to exports
  • Hoped-for economic gains did not materialise
  • Rome says still expects good relations with Beijing
翻译:概括：
  • 意大利2019年签署协议预计出口大幅增长
  • 期望的经济收益并未实现
  • 罗马称仍期望与北京保持良好关系

Italy has officially informed China that it is quitting the Belt and Road Initiative (BRI), dismissing fears the move might sour relations and damage the Italian economy, government sources said on Wednesday.翻译:政府消息人士周三表示，意大利已正式通知中国将退出“一带一路”倡议，消除了此举可能恶化关系并损害意大利经济的担忧。

Italy in 2019 became the first and so far only major Western nation to join the trade and investment programme, ignoring warnings from the United States that it might let China take control of sensitive technologies and vital infrastructure.翻译:2019年，意大利成为第一个也是迄今为止唯一一个加入该贸易和投资计划的西方主要国家，无视美国可能让中国控制敏感技术和重要基础设施的警告。

However, when Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni took office last year, she said she wanted to withdraw from the deal, which was championed by President Xi Jinping, saying it had brought no significant gains to Italy.翻译:然而，总理乔治亚·梅洛尼(Giorgia Meloni)去年上任时表示，她想退出习近平主席倡导的这项协议，称该协议没有给意大利带来任何重大收益。

The 2019 accord expires in March 2024 and an Italian government source said Rome had sent Beijing a letter "in recent days" informing China that it would not be renewing the pact.翻译:2019 年协议将于 2024 年 3 月到期，意大利政府消息人士称，罗马“最近几天”致函北京，通知中国不会续签该协议。

There was no immediate comment from China.翻译:中国没有立即发表评论。

"We have every intention of maintaining excellent relations with China even if we are no longer part of the Belt and Road Initiative," a second government source said.翻译:另一位政府消息人士表示：“即使我们不再参与‘一带一路’倡议，我们也完全愿意与中国保持良好的关系。”

"Other G7 nations have closer relations with China than we do, despite the fact they were never in (the BRI)," he added.翻译:“其他七国集团国家与中国的关系比我们更密切，尽管它们从未参与过（一带一路），”他补充道。

Italy will assume the presidency of the G7 in 2024.翻译:意大利将于2024年担任七国集团主席国。

More than 100 countries have signed agreements with China to cooperate on BRI infrastructure and building projects since the scheme was launched in 2013. The then Italian Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte hoped for a trade bonanza when he signed up in 2019, but Chinese firms seemed to be the main beneficiaries.翻译:自2013年该计划启动以来，已有100多个国家与中国签署了“一带一路”基础设施和建筑项目合作协议。时任意大利总理朱塞佩·孔戴(Giuseppe Conte)在2019年签署协议时希望能带来贸易繁荣，但中国企业似乎主要受益者。

Italian exports to China totalled 16.4 billion euros ($17.7 billion) last year from 13 billion euros in 2019. By contrast, Chinese exports to Italy rose to 57.5 billion from 31.7 billion over the same period, according to Italian data.翻译:去年，意大利对中国的出口总额从2019年的130亿欧元增至164亿欧元（合177亿美元）。相比之下，根据意大利数据，同期中国对意大利的出口额从317亿增至575亿。

Italy's main euro zone trading partners France and Germany exported significantly more to China last year, despite not being part of the BRI, which is modelled on the old Silk Road that linked China to the West.翻译:意大利的主要欧元区贸易伙伴法国和德国去年对中国的出口大幅增加，尽管它们不是“一带一路”的一部分。“一带一路”是以连接中国与西方的古老丝绸之路为蓝本的。

Looking to maintain strategic ties, Foreign Minister Antonio Tajani visited Beijing in September and President Sergio Mattarella is due to visit China at some stage next year.翻译:为了保持战略关系，外交部长安东尼奥·塔亚尼于九月访问了北京，总统塞尔吉奥·马塔雷拉也将于明年某个阶段访问中国。

Meloni herself has said she wants to go to Beijing, but no date has been fixed.翻译:梅洛尼本人也表示她想去北京，但具体日期尚未确定。

Despite being part of the BRI, successive governments in Rome signalled their doubts about the pact by vetoing some proposed takeovers or limiting the sway of Chinese companies over their Italian counterparts.翻译:尽管是“一带一路”倡议的一部分，但罗马历届政府都通过否决一些拟议的收购或限制中国企业对意大利同行的影响力来表达对该协议的疑虑。

In June, Meloni's cabinet curbed the influence of Chinese shareholder Sinochem (600500.SS) on Italian tyremaker Pirelli, using "golden power" rules designed to protect strategic assets.翻译:6月，梅洛尼内阁利用旨在保护战略资产的“黄金权力”规则， 遏制了中国股东中化集团（600500.SS）对意大利轮胎制造商倍耐力的影响。

Meloni, who heads a conservative coalition, has been keen to burnish her credentials as a committed pro-NATO leader and a government source said that she had assured U.S. President Joe Biden earlier this year that Italy would quit the BRI.翻译:领导保守派联盟的梅洛尼一直热衷于提升自己作为坚定的亲北约领导人的信誉，一位政府消息人士称，她今年早些时候已向美国总统乔·拜登保证，意大利将退出“一带一路”倡议。

item.title: 美国在海军舰艇中替代炸弹级铀的研究取得进展 - 文件
item.description:
U.S. research is advancing on the potential to change fuel for nuclear reactors on Navy submarines and aircraft carriers from bomb-grade uranium to a safer option, documents showed Wednesday, even as the program's funding is at risk in Congress.翻译:周三的文件显示，美国研究正在推进将海军潜艇和航空母舰上的核反应堆燃料从炸弹级铀改为更安全的选择的可能性，尽管该计划的资金在国会面临风险。

In order to lower proliferation risks of keeping stockpiles of highly-enriched uranium, the U.S. government has been exploring since 2018 how to use low-enriched fuel that cannot be used as fissile material in weapons.翻译:为了降低高浓缩铀库存的扩散风险，美国政府自2018年以来一直在探索如何使用不能用作武器裂变材料的低浓缩燃料。

The U.S. research program progressed from a planning phase into an "iterative experimental campaign phase" in fiscal year 2021 and early findings represent progress in what could be a 20-to 25- year design effort, said a report to Congress last year from the National Nuclear Security Administration (NNSA).翻译:美国国家科学院去年向国会提交的一份报告称，美国的研究计划在 2021 财年从规划阶段进入了“迭代实验阶段”，早期发现代表了可能需要 20 至 25 年设计工作的进展。核安全管理局（NNSA）。

The report, seen by Reuters, had not been revealed previously.翻译:路透社看到的这份报告此前并未披露过。

The issue of highly-enriched fuel in naval vessels is heightened by the $245 billion AUKUS defense technology partnership with Australia and Britain that provides for the sale of U.S. nuclear-powered submarines and sharing of nuclear-propulsion technology with Australia in response to China's growing power in the Indo-Pacific.翻译:海军舰艇中的高浓缩燃料问题因AUKUS与澳大利亚和英国价值2450亿美元的国防技术伙伴关系而变得更加严重，该伙伴关系规定出售美国核动力潜艇并与澳大利亚分享核推进技术，以应对中国日益增长的实力在印度-太平洋地区。

Non-proliferation experts say sending submarines to Australia that use highly-enriched uranium could set a precedent for other countries to use the fuel.翻译:防扩散专家表示，向澳大利亚派遣使用高浓缩铀的潜艇可能会为其他国家使用这种燃料开创先例。

The low-enriched uranium fuel program seeks to meet "the stringent requirements for the power output, compact size, and long-life the U.S. Navy requires," said the NNSA report.翻译:国家核安全局的报告称，低浓铀燃料计划旨在满足“美国海军对功率输出、紧凑尺寸和长寿命的严格要求”。

The document concluded that "initial activities are the first steps on a long, costly path to fuel development and success is not assured."翻译:该文件的结论是：“初步活动只是漫长而昂贵的燃料开发道路上的第一步，成功并不能保证。”

It also mentioned a 2016 report's findings that it could take over $1 billion to develop alternative fuel. The earlier report also said low-enriched fuel would negatively impact reactor endurance and ship costs and operational effectiveness.翻译:它还提到了 2016 年报告的调查结果，即开发替代燃料可能需要超过 10 亿美元。早些时候的报告还表示，低浓缩燃料将对反应堆耐久性、船舶成本和运行效率产生负面影响。

The 2022 report warned the costs could detract from higher-priority non-proliferation and naval propulsion research and development activities.翻译:2022 年报告警告称，这些成本可能会影响更优先的防扩散和海军推进研发活动。

Still, head of the NNSA Jill Hruby said in the document she was pleased with progress the program has made "in this technically challenging effort."翻译:尽管如此，国家核安全局负责人吉尔·赫鲁比在文件中表示，她对该项目“在这项技术上具有挑战性的工作中”取得的进展感到高兴。

NNSA did not immediately respond to questions about the documents.翻译:国家核安全局没有立即回应有关这些文件的问题。

Congress has given the program $100 million since 2016 but funding is in question after the subcommittee in the Republican-controlled House of Representatives this year voted to stop it. The Senate has approved funding and the two chambers are expected to work together to figure out any funding.翻译:自 2016 年以来，国会已为该计划提供了 1 亿美元，但在共和党控制的众议院小组委员会今年投票阻止该计划后，资金出现了问题。参议院已批准拨款，两院预计将共同努力确定拨款方案。

Alan Kuperman, a professor at the University of Texas at Austin and coordinator at the Nuclear Proliferation Prevention Project, has pushed the government to embrace low-enriched uranium for Navy vessels and obtained the documents from NNSA.翻译:德克萨斯大学奥斯汀分校教授兼核扩散预防项目协调员艾伦·库珀曼（Alan Kuperman）推动政府为海军舰艇采用低浓铀，并从国家核安全局获得了文件。

"These documents clarify three things for the first time: the program is vital to preventing the spread of nuclear weapons, is making rapid progress, and will be implemented only if it can preserve the performance of U.S. Navy vessels," Kuperman said.翻译:库珀曼说：“这些文件首次澄清了三件事：该计划对于防止核武器扩散至关重要，正在迅速取得进展，并且只有在能够保持美国海军舰艇性能的情况下才会实施。”

He said the potential $1 billion cost for the fuel was small compared to trillions spent on the Navy's nuclear fleet.翻译:他表示，与海军核舰队花费的数万亿美元相比，燃料的潜在成本 10 亿美元是很小的。

The Defense Department did not immediately respond to a request for comment about the program.翻译:国防部没有立即回应有关该计划的置评请求。

item.title: 穆迪下调前景使北京针对市场空头的“战争”变得更加复杂
item.description:
Summary:
  • Moody's move raises pressure on govt to do more to support markets
  • Confidence in Chinese assets could deteriorate further, analysts
  • Beijing's steps to bolster economy, markets have had modest effect so far
翻译:概括：
  • 穆迪的举动给政府带来了采取更多措施支持市场的压力
  • 分析师对中国资产的信心可能进一步恶化
  • 北京采取的提振经济和市场的措施迄今为止效果有限

Moody's negative outlook on China has intensified Beijing's battle with market bears, raising pressure on the government for more forceful measures to prop up sinking stocks and stabilise the yuan as investor confidence deteriorates.翻译:穆迪对中国的负面展望加剧了北京方面与市场空头的斗争，在投资者信心恶化之际，加大了政府采取更有力措施支撑下跌股市并稳定人民币汇率的压力。

In its Tuesday announcement, the ratings agency flagged weakening growth prospects, adding to mounting global concerns that China's economic miracle is over, potentially leaving the world's second-largest economy stuck in a middle-income trap.翻译:该评级机构在周二的声明中指出，增长前景疲软，加剧了全球对中国经济奇迹已经结束的担忧，可能会让这个世界第二大经济体陷入中等收入陷阱。

While keeping China's sovereign rating at A1, Moody's cut its outlook to negative from stable, citing surging municipal debt and property market woes. Such concerns have prompted other institutions to draw comparisons with Japan's similar macroeconomic symptoms before its "lost decades" of stagnation.翻译:在维持中国主权评级为 A1 的同时，穆迪将其前景从稳定下调至负面，理由是市政债务激增和房地产市场困境。这种担忧促使其他机构将日本在“失去的几十年”停滞之前的类似宏观经济症状进行比较。

Even though China's rising debt levels and over-reliance on property have long been part of the conversation, the voice of a ratings agency carried enough weight to renew a sell-off in Chinese assets and prompt state bank actions in markets.翻译:尽管中国不断上升的债务水平和对房地产的过度依赖长期以来一直是人们讨论的一部分，但评级机构的声音足以再次抛售中国资产，并促使国有银行在市场上采取行动。

"This is a financial war," said Yuan Yuwei, founder and CIO of Water Wisdom Asset Management.翻译:“这是一场金融战。”水智慧资管创始人兼CIO袁宇伟表示。

Moody's move "would trigger foreign reduction in Chinese assets, and would also push up China's funding costs, potentially leading to deterioration in asset quality."翻译:穆迪此举“将引发外资减持中国资产，也会推高中国融资成本，可能导致资产质量恶化”。

Authorities have taken a raft of economic support measures and targeted steps to prop up the stock market, including cutting stamp duty, slowing the pace of listings and getting state-backed funds to buy stocks.翻译:当局采取了一系列经济支持措施和有针对性的措施来支撑股市，包括削减印花税、放慢上市步伐以及让国家支持的资金购买股票。

In an apparent effort to calm the market, the official Shanghai Securities News reported on Wednesday that China's securities watchdog will promote reforms to attract more long-term capital into the market.翻译:官方《上海证券报》周三报道称，中国证券监管机构将推动改革，吸引更多长期资本进入市场，这显然是为了安抚市场。

And last week, state-owned China Reform Holdings Corp said it had started buying index funds to support the market, following a similar move by sovereign fund Central Huijin Investment.翻译:上周，国有国新控股公司表示，继主权基金中央汇金投资有限公司采取类似举措后，该公司已开始购买指数基金以支撑市场。

But, on the other side of the trade, the weakening prospects for the Chinese economy could prove hard to shake off as confidence remains low.翻译:但在贸易的另一面，由于信心依然低迷，中国经济前景疲软可能难以摆脱。

"The pressures on Chinese stocks and the economy more generally are likely to increase if the cost of insuring the sovereign debt continues to rise and bailouts begin," said Ryan Yonk, economist at the American Institute for Economic Research.翻译:美国经济研究所经济学家瑞安·永克表示：“如果主权债务的保险成本继续上升并且开始实施救助，中国股市和整体经济面临的压力可能会增加。”

Rob Carnell, Asia-Pacific Head of Research at ING said that China has used many tools already to drive up demand but with limited effect, "so getting people to regain confidence in this market is going to be really hard."翻译:荷兰国际集团(ING)亚太区研究主管罗布·卡内尔(Rob Carnell)表示，中国已经使用了许多工具来拉动需求，但效果有限，“因此让人们重拾对这个市场的信心将非常困难。”

Ultimately, analysts warn, sentiment can only stabilise sustainably if China delivers a credible longer-term roadmap for solving the structural weaknesses that are curbing its growth potential.翻译:最终，分析师警告说，只有中国提供可靠的长期路线图来解决抑制其增长潜力的结构性弱点，市场情绪才能持续稳定。

"The priority for China now is to stabilize growth momentum and raise confidence for the future," said Calvin Zhang, senior portfolio manager at Federated Hermes.翻译:Federated Hermes高级投资组合经理Calvin Zhang表示：“中国现在的首要任务是稳定增长势头并增强对未来的信心。”

China should increase fiscal spending and address local governments' hidden debt, Zhang said.翻译:张说，中国应该增加财政支出并解决地方政府的隐性债务。

In October, China unveiled a plan to issue 1 trillion yuan ($139 billion) in sovereign bonds by the end of the year, raising the 2023 budget deficit target to 3.8% of gross domestic product (GDP) from the original 3%.

YUAN WORRIES

China's blue-chip index (.CSI300) hit its lowest level in nearly five years on Wednesday.翻译:中国蓝筹股指数（.CSI300）周三触及近五年来的最低水平。

Major state-owned banks also stepped up U.S. dollar selling very forcefully on Tuesday, and again on Wednesday. China's central bank has used various tools in recent months to stem the yuan's slide, including stronger fixings before the market open.翻译:主要国有银行周二和周三也大力加大了美元抛售力度。近几个月来，中国央行使用了各种工具来阻止人民币贬值，包括在开盘前加强中间价。

Still, outflow pressure remains high.翻译:尽管如此，资金流出压力仍然很高。

China recorded its first-ever quarterly deficit in foreign direct investment in July-September, while Goldman Sachs data showed outflows from China reached $75 billion in September, the biggest monthly exodus since 2016.翻译:7月至9月，中国首次出现季度外国直接投资赤字，而高盛的数据显示，9月份中国的资金流出达到750亿美元，这是自2016年以来最大的月度资金外流。

Moody's outlook cut could raise the stakes further, analysts said.翻译:分析师表示，穆迪下调前景可能会进一步增加风险。

"This is a blow to the already low investor confidence in China," said Qi Wang, chief investment officer of UOB Kay Hian's wealth management division in Hong Kong.翻译:大华继显香港财富管理部门首席投资官王琪表示：“这对中国本已低迷的投资者信心是一个打击。”

Sovereign credit is the foundation of Chinese assets, so the move "would certainly impact the yuan exchange rate, and reduce global investors' risk appetite."翻译:主权信用是中国资产的基础，因此此举“肯定会影响人民币汇率，并降低全球投资者的风险偏好”。

But not everyone is bearish.翻译:但并非所有人都看跌。

Rival ratings agencies Fitch Ratings and S&P Global Ratings have made no changes to their respective China credit ratings. Fitch affirmed China's A+ rating with a stable outlook in August, while S&P Global said on Wednesday it has retained China's A+ rating with a 'stable' outlook.翻译:竞争对手评级机构惠誉评级和标准普尔全球评级没有改变各自的中国信用评级。惠誉8月确认中国A+评级，展望稳定，标普全球周三表示维持中国A+评级，展望“稳定”。

Some market participants pointed to similar rating moves on the United States as having limited long-term market impact.翻译:一些市场参与者指出，美国类似的评级变动对长期市场影响有限。

"Just as most people shrugged off the U.S. downgrade, most investors will shrug off the China downgrade," said Jason Hsu, chief investment officer at Rayliant Global Advisors.翻译:“正如大多数人对美国评级下调不屑一顾一样，大多数投资者也会对中国评级下调不屑一顾，”瑞联全球顾问公司首席投资官 Jason Hsu 表示。

Reporting by Samuel Shen and Winni Zhou in Shanghai and Summer Zhen in Hong Kong; Ankur Banerjee in Singapore; additional reporting by Megan Davies in New York; Editing by Marius Zaharia and Shri Navaratnam翻译:Samuel Shen 和 Winni Zhou 在上海以及 Summer Zen 在香港的报道； Ankur Banerjee 在新加坡；梅根·戴维斯在纽约的补充报道；编辑：Marius Zaharia 和 Shri Navaratnam

item.title: 王毅同布林肯强调推动中美关系稳定健康发展
item.description:
China's Foreign Minister Wang Yi said on Wednesday that promoting healthy, stable and sustainable China-U.S. relations is an important task, in a phone call with U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken.翻译:中国外交部长王毅周三在与美国国务卿布林肯通电话时表示，推动中美关系健康稳定可持续是一项重要任务。

Blinken also discussed his recent travel in the Middle East and U.S. diplomatic efforts in the region with Wang, according to an earlier statement from the U.S. Department of State.翻译:根据美国国务院早些时候的声明，布林肯还与王毅讨论了他最近的中东之行以及美国在该地区的外交努力。

In the call, the two top diplomats exchanged views on the Israeli-Hamas conflict and agreed to maintain communication on the situation in the Middle East, according to a Chinese foreign ministry statement.翻译:据中国外交部声明，两国高级外交官在通话中就以色列与哈马斯冲突交换了意见，并同意就中东局势保持沟通。

Wang said during the conversation that the top priority at the moment is to cease fire and cease fighting "as soon as possible."翻译:王毅在谈话中表示，当前当务之急是“尽快”停火、停止战斗。

Blinken also thanked Wang for going to the U.S. Embassy in China to express his condolences to former U.S. Secretary of State Henry Kissinger, said the Chinese foreign ministry.翻译:中国外交部表示，布林肯还感谢王毅前往美国驻华使馆向美国前国务卿基辛格表示慰问。

Henry Kissinger, the most powerful U.S. diplomat of the Cold War era, who helped Washington open up to China, died last week.翻译:冷战时期美国最有权势的外交官、帮助华盛顿向中国开放的亨利·基辛格上周去世。

"Dr. Kissinger has always advocated that China and the United States should respect each other, evolve together, and fulfill their international responsibilities," Wang was quoted as saying in the phone call.翻译:王毅在电话中表示：“基辛格博士一贯主张中美应相互尊重、共同发展、履行国际责任。”

Wang also repeatedly stressed that the United States should fully understand the importance of the Taiwan issue to China, and that Kissinger's diplomatic legacy is worthy of being carried forward and developed by future generations.翻译:王毅还多次强调，美国应充分认识台湾问题对中国的重要性，基辛格的外交遗产值得后人继承和发展。

Wang and Blinken also emphasised the importance of building upon progress made on key issues in the summit between the countries' respective presidents in California in November, according to statements from their respective departments.翻译:根据各自部门的声明，王毅和布林肯还强调了在 11 月两国总统在加州举行的峰会上在关键问题上取得进展的重要性。

Reporting by Beijing newsroom; Writing by Bernard Orr; Editing by Christopher Cushing and Kim Coghill翻译:北京新闻编辑室报道；伯纳德·奥尔撰写；克里斯托弗·库欣和金·科吉尔编辑

item.title: 中国称其战机在台湾海峡跟踪美国海军巡逻机
item.description:
China's military said on Wednesday it sent fighter jets to monitor and warn a U.S. Navy patrol aircraft that flew over the sensitive Taiwan Strait, a mission that took place weeks before Taiwan holds elections.翻译:中国军方周三表示，已派出战斗机对飞越敏感的台湾海峡的美国海军巡逻机进行监视和警告，这项任务是在台湾举行选举前几周执行的。

China claims sovereignty over democratically governed Taiwan, and says it has jurisdiction over the strait. Taiwan and the United States dispute that, saying the Taiwan Strait is an international waterway.翻译:中国声称对民主治理的台湾拥有主权，并表示对该海峡拥有管辖权。台湾和美国对此存在争议，称台湾海峡是国际水道。

The U.S. Navy's 7th Fleet said the P-8A Poseidon maritime patrol and reconnaissance plane, which is also used for anti-submarine missions, flew over the strait in international airspace.翻译:美国海军第七舰队表示，P-8A海神海上巡逻侦察机也用于反潜任务，在国际空域飞越了海峡。

"The aircraft's transit of the Taiwan Strait demonstrates the United States' commitment to a free and open Indo-Pacific. The United States military flies, sails and operates anywhere international law allows," it said in a statement.翻译:“这架飞机飞越台湾海峡表明了美国对自由开放的印太地区的承诺。美国军队在国际法允许的任何地方飞行、航行和行动，”它在一份声明中说。

China's military described the flight as "public hype", adding it had sent fighters to monitor and warn the U.S. plane and "deal with it in accordance with the law and regulations".翻译:中国军方称此次飞行是“公开炒作”，并补充说已派出战机对美机进行监视和警告，并“依法依规予以处理”。

"Troops in the theatre are always on high alert and will resolutely defend national sovereignty and security as well as regional peace and stability," the Eastern Theatre Command of the People's Liberation Army said in a statement.翻译:解放军东部战区在声明中表示，战区部队始终保持高度戒备，坚决捍卫国家主权安全和地区和平稳定。

Taiwan's defence ministry said its forces monitored the U.S. aircraft as it flew in south through the strait, and described the situation as "normal".翻译:台湾国防部表示，当美国飞机向南飞经海峡时，台湾部队对其进行了监视，并称情况“正常”。

The last time the U.S. Navy announced a Poseidon had flown through the strait, in October, China said it had sent fighter jets to monitor and warn the aircraft.翻译:上次美国海军宣布波塞冬飞机飞越该海峡是在10月份，中国表示已派出战斗机对飞机进行监视和警告。

Taiwan is gearing up for presidential and parliamentary elections on Jan. 13, which China has cast as a choice between war and peace.翻译:台湾正在为 1 月 13 日的总统和议会选举做准备，中国将这次选举视为战争与和平之间的选择。

China has stepped up its military activity around Taiwan in the past four years, including staging two rounds of major war games over the last year and a half.翻译:过去四年来，中国加强了在台湾周边的军事活动，包括在过去一年半的时间里举行了两轮大型军演。
